A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I saw this movie only because the people I was with insisted I see this movie with them. I had no interest of seeing this movie\, I heard rumors it sucked. Well I am here to tell you those rumors are true. I have never in my life seen a blockbuster so careless in my life. BASICALLY\, DISNEY TOLD OTF'S TO GO F THEMSELVES. They never handled the older characters with respect\, newer characters were poorly developed\, there was some hyper political elements in this movie (which makes no sense.) So I am going to have to say that this movie is not worth the money for the cost of the ticket. Don't believe the shady reviews or the hype it sucks!
